## Source: ossf-package-analysis (7975ebc737a4c604d0d25ee00a187fde74d2442953ec305c57c738ebd4cdedcd)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'validate-rb' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
